title: DD Hokuto no Ken 2: Ichigo Aji Plus
alternative_title: DD Fist of the North Star 2: Strawberry Flavor Plus, DD北斗の拳2 イチゴ味+
description: The wraparound band on the sixth volume of Kajio's DD Hokuto no Ken (DD Fist of the North Star) manga spinoff of Buronson and Tetsuo Hara's Fist of the North Star manga is revealed the manga is getting a new television anime adaptation in October.
